metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20431 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged.
metadata.Description: In the Lustre file system before 2.12.3, the ptlrpc module has an osd_map_remote_to_local out-of-bounds access and panic due to the lack of validation for specific fields of packets sent by a client. osd_bufs_get in the osd_ldiskfs module does not validate a certain length value.

criterions.comment: lustre: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
